articles.title: Samsung plans to sell a million units of its new wider foldable phone - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The Korean tech giant will compete with the iPhone Fold directly. Samsung only recently officially announced its tri-fold called the Galaxy Z TriFold and...
articles.content: Samsung only recently officially announced its tri-fold called the Galaxy Z TriFold and even sold some units in South Korea. But later this year, the company is expected to launch yet another foldabl… [+943 chars]
